original_text: And it came to pass, as he had made an end of speaking all these words, that the ground clave asunder that was under them:
korean_text: 그가 이 모든 말을 마치자마자 그들이 섰던 땅바닥이 갈라지니라

sentences.original_text: as he had made an end of speaking all these words
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이 모든 말씀을 마치 말씀하였을 때에
